data.title: 准备以至少20秒的时间回答以下问题
data.answer: The construction team and the insurance company should cooperate to prevent the destruction of homes and property in natural disasters. Construction teams should always be aware of the regional features, that is, what are the natural disasters that are likely to happen due to climate or geographical reasons in this region, and what are their harms to homes and properties. Based on historical data and experiences, local construction teams should be capable of designing and constructing anti-destruction houses. Construction teams are responsible for the prospective work to prevent the damage, and insurance companies are responsible for the retrospective work to cover the loss. The insurance company can collaborate with the government to provide an endowment to help homes overcome the toughness.
data.referenceText: Who is responsible for preventing the destruction of home and property in natural disasters?
data.referenceTranslate: 谁负责防止家庭和财产在自然灾害中被破坏？
